description.en: Execute scripts from input to edit entries.
description.zh: 执行输入的脚本来编辑条目。

list.name: scripts
list.label: Scripts
list.description: Edit the list named "entries" directly in JavaScript to have your project updated. Note that this plugin is more of a plugin for development, which requires you understand vLabeler's `Entry` and `LabelerConf` definitions.
